title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Student Support attttttt
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Student Support attttttt 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation at 

11 p.m. on 31 December 2020. 

Definition

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Student
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Student 

Support Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 77 of 2020). 

Amendment of Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean student support regulation 2020 (s.i no 77 2020) amendment regulation 2(1) principal regulation

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations is amended by the 

insertion of the following definition after the definition of “prior scheme”: 

“ ‘relevant specified jurisdiction’ means the United Kingdom as respects the 
class of person standing prescribed by virtue of paragraph (3) (inserted by 
Regulation 5 of the Student Support (Amendment) Regulations 2021) of 
Regulation 5;”. 

Amendment of Regulation 4(c) of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 3 regulation 2(1) principal regulation amended insertion following definition definition prior scheme relevant specified jurisdiction mean united kingdom respect class person standing prescribed virtue paragraph (3) (inserted regulation 5 student support (amendment) regulation 2021) regulation 5  amendment regulation 4(c) principal regulation

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. Regulation 4(c) of the Principal Regulations is amended –
text_raw:
4. Regulation 4(c) of the Principal Regulations is amended – 

(a) 

in subparagraph (ii), by the substitution of “Member State, other 
than the State, or in a relevant specified jurisdiction that comes 
within the terms of section 7(1)(e) or (f) of the Act” for 
“Member State other than the State that comes within the terms 
of section 7(1)(e) of the Act”, and 

(b) 

in subparagraph (iii), by the insertion of “or the relevant 
specified jurisdiction, as the case may be” after “Member State” 
in each place where it occurs. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [6] 3 

Amendment of Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 5. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion
text_raw:
5. Regulation 5 of the Principal Regulations is amended by the insertion 

of the following paragraph after paragraph (2): 

“(3) The following class of person is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 
(aa) of section 14(1) of the Act, namely a person who is a national of the 
United Kingdom”. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

4 January, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 January, 2021. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
